snippet: Five Americans and two Peruvians were killed Monday when the helicopter they were in crashed in the jungle near Pucallpa, in the central part of the country, soon after takeoff.
lead_paragraph: Five Americans and two Peruvians were killed Monday when the helicopter they were in crashed in the jungle near Pucallpa, in the central part of the country, soon after takeoff.

headline.seo: Peru: 5 Americans and 2 Peruvians Die in Copter Crash
headline.main: Peru: 5 Americans and 2 Peruvians Die in Copter Crash
